text: Human cloning is the creation of a human being, human cell, or human tissue taken from another human. This method is used to make an exact copy of a human. It has two types: *To make an exact copy of a cell (therapeutic cloning). *To reproduce a human being (reproductive cloning). == Other websites == *Variations and voids: the regulation of human cloning around the world Category:Cloning Category:Genetic engineering Category:Humans
title: Human cloning
